properties.name: feature-flags.path-patterns.includes
properties.description: List of Ant-style path patterns for request paths to include in feature flag checks.

properties.name: feature-flags.path-patterns.excludes
properties.description: List of Ant-style path patterns for request paths to exclude from feature flag checks.

properties.name: feature-flags.response.type
properties.description: The type of response to return.

properties.name: feature-flags.default-enabled
properties.description: Whether undefined feature flags are enabled by default. Defaults to false (fail-closed): undefined flags block access. Set to true for fail-open behavior: undefined flags allow access.
